comment: She's a bit eccentric, and you have to get used to that. She lets guest speakers take over a good bit of her classes and there's no actual work you do in class other than quizzes. All the lectures go over what you had to do in online reflections. The outside of class work load is too heavy for an introductory to college class.

She truly cares about the subject she teaches. She shows enthusiasm with this seminar class. She is so sweet and tad goofy. The class is extremely easy. It is mostly composed of papers and a final project. If you do everything according to each rubric you will DEFINITELY get an A!

Its a mandatory class, however, she is very enthusiastic about what she teaches! Sooooo many extra credit options!!! Easiest "A" I've ever received. I would recommend her to anyone! I took her hybrid class. Again, one of the easiest I've ever taken.
Great teacher and very nice. Took her hybrid class. Huge work load but very easy.

She is a really caring teacher. I really enjoyed having her class and I loved all of the discussions we had. This was easily my funnest class. The only down side is that the work we are given is very time consuming.
She's nice, but the work load required for such a trivial class was more than all of my other classes combined.  the projects aren't difficult but time comsuming.

Didn't really learn anything from the class, and she talks about racism way to much. Almost as if slavery still exists today. But other than that very easy class. Final project was a bit childish but whatever. Take this if you want an A.

Such an easy A!! Dr. Saunders  is willing to do whatever she can to give you extra credit points. There are so many opportunities for them throughout the semester. As long as you do your work, you WILL get an A! I know people who didn't even have to do a final because they had so many extra credit points.

Dr Saunders is very easy and gives a lot of opportunities for extra credit. As long as you do the work, you will get an A. She does require that you come to class, but her classes are not boring, so its okay. For the final you get to choose 2 out of 6 projects( like a photo book, book review, charity work,etc). Very easy class, I suggest her.

Mrs. Saunders is an awesome professor. She does speak a good deal about racism because it is, believe it or not, still very relevant to today's kids. Very helpful lady, she was always willing and available before/after class. If you do the work  and the daily reflections this should be an easy A. Shes pretty good looking I might add.
she is the best teacher take her i love her ... her class is so easy!!! and she is goodlooking!

Dr. Saunders' class was completely pointless, I don't think I learned a thing from the material.  However, it is very easy and I got a 105 or something and I am in no way shape or form a straight A student.  If you do the daily reflections on the chapter, show up to class, and do some extra credit, you should EASILY get an A.  Easiest class ever.

Dr. Saunders is a really nice lady, but I still think the class KSU 1101 is stupid. But it was an easy A for me (got a 98). There is so much extra credit, no one has an excuse to not make an A. She talks ALOT about Racism. It becomes very annoying. She has very liberal views which become very annoying if your conservative. Overall, its an easy clas

Vry nice wonderful lady loves to teach Midterm is a 4 page paper review of 2 on campus events one must "expand" u paragraps of each chapte are stupid but e-z Personally i think this class is stupid but since u have 2 take it get her shes nice U hve 3 options 4 ur final Her goal at ksaw is to spread racism awareness talks bout racism A LOT

GREAT teacher! She is extremely sweet. Assignments are easy and there is about one homework a week. Midterm and final were a breeze. She brings in food every so often and is really thoughtful. Loved her!
Love her! so fun, and always dresses cute. She is veryy nice. Homework is mandatory for grade but its easy. Homework is assigned once a week. no tests. 8 page midterm but its easy. Final is easy!

Professor Saunders KSU 1101 orientation class was very fun this year. She was a fair grader and was organized throughout the entire semester. She was very nice and even brought in food and Christmas gifts for the class (CD's & ornaments). SHE ROCKS!
